description:
Job Summary:
As an Online Marketing Events Specialist at Concierge Travel, you will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and executing online marketing events to promote our services and increase brand awareness. This is a remote-based full-time position and you will work independently as an individual contributor. You will work closely with the marketing team to create engaging and impactful events that will attract potential clients and drive business growth.

Compensation & Benefits:
This is a full-time position with a competitive compensation package. Along with a competitive pay, you will receive a comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, paid time off, and opportunities for professional development and growth.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement a comprehensive online marketing events strategy to promote Concierge Travel and its services.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to identify target audience and create event concepts that will appeal to them.
- Plan and coordinate all aspects of virtual events, including content creation, guest speakers, and technical setup.
- Utilize various online marketing platforms, such as social media, email marketing, and webinars, to promote events and attract attendees.
- Create event timelines and manage event budgets to ensure events are executed efficiently and within budget.
- Work with internal and external partners to secure sponsorships and partnerships to enhance event impact and reach.
- Monitor and track event metrics and provide post-event analysis and reports to measure success and identify areas for improvement.
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in online marketing events to continuously improve event strategies.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field.
- Minimum of 2 years of experience in online marketing events planning and coordination.
- Proven track record of success in developing and executing effective online marketing events.
- Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple events simultaneously.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Proficiency in using various online marketing platforms, such as social media, email marketing, and webinars.
- Knowledge of virtual event tools and platforms, such as Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and WebEx.
- Flexibility to work occasional evenings and weekends as needed for event coverage.
